channel.title: Trucks Trailers_truck Tarspreader on Universal
channel.description: Recent content in Trucks Trailers_truck Tarspreader on Universal

item.title: E04680
item.description: Hino 700FY tarspreader, RHD, twin burners, Rincheval 2.40 - 4.10 Mtr extendable spray bar, spray & distance meter + printer, 8x4 configuration, manual gearbox, 295/80R22.5 tyres, rear view camera. Truck comes straight out of work. Inspections are welcome.

item.title: E04690
item.description: Mercedes-Benz 1820 tarspreader, RHD, 2.40 Mtr spray bar, twin burners, hydraulic bitumen pump, 4x2 configuration, manual gearbox, 12R22.5 tyres on average 85% remaining. Truck is Ex Goverment and comes straight out of work. Inspections are welcome.
